pages.text: A $(item)Guard Drone/$ is a specialized non-programmable type of $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ which should be deployed against any inventory block. It will import one item to use as a weapon and attack any nearby mobs (within a 31x31x31 cube) with it.$(p)Like any other Drone, they require $(l:base_concepts/pressure)air/$ to operate, and will automatically seek out a $(l:machines/charging_station)Charging Station/$ if low on air.

The $(thing)Guard Drone/$ does not care what is in the inventory, so take care that you a put a useful melee weapon in there. If & when the weapon breaks and there are no replacements in the inventory, the drone will continue to fight unarmed, which is very ineffective.$(p)The drone may be equipped with a $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#minigun)Minigun Upgrade/$, in which case you should add $(l:tools/minigun_ammo)Minigun Ammo/$ to the inventory instead.
